page.title: 11LAW AND ORDER IN PENDLESIDE
page.content: Our local{policeman}is P.C. Duerden.He works by himself and uses his own car. He works his 8Hr. shifts according to any problems which have arisen.A part of his work is to{visit schools}and introduce himself to the children.He also visits{farmers}who occasionally have trouble with stray{dogs attacking {their sheep,}or complain of lost stock Usually these have wandered into the wrong field by mistake, but sometimes they have been "rustled". Every year {turkeys are stolen}from local farms at Christmas-time. There are{few serious {crimes, vandalism}is not frequent. He sometimes has to attend{road accidents Many of these are caused by people, often strangers travelling too fast on narrow roads slippery with mud. Most crimes are solved quickly as{local {people}tend to notice strangers and {report unusual happenings.
